official-title.#text:
To prohibit an institution of higher education that participates in a boycott of the Israeli
			 government, economy, or academia from receiving funds 
from the U.S. Federal Government.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

text.#text:
No Federal funds appropriated after the date of the enactment of this Act may be used to enter into
			 a contract, memorandum of understanding, or cooperative agreement with,
			 make a grant to, award to, or provide a loan or loan guarantee to any
			 institution of higher education that participates in a boycott of the
			 Israeli government, economy, or academia.  This prohibition includes any

			 scholars to the State of Israel—then that institution shall be determined
			 to be participating in a boycott of the Israeli government, economy, or
